title: Introduction to using FlickrAPI
code: # pak::pkg_install("koki25ando/FlickrAPI") library(FlickrAPI)

what: Setting up a Flickr API key
title: Introduction to using FlickrAPI
code: # Set the API key for a single session setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE")  # Install the API key for future sessions setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE", install = TRUE)  # Overwrite an existing API key setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE", overwrite = TRUE)

title: Introduction to using FlickrAPI
text: two functions searching Flickr photos: getPhotos() getPhotoSearch() getPhotos() allows get public photos Flickr user photos account associated Flickr API key. getPhotoSearch() supports broader range search options including: User id Tags License Bounding box (photos locations) getPhotoSearch() returns 100 photos per page default can increased 250 using bbox parameter searching location 500 otherwise. Additional pages can accessed using page parameter. extras parameter can used return additional information photos including “description”, “date_upload”, “date_taken”, “owner_name”, urls available image sizes.
code: # Search for photos uploaded by Koki Ando getPhotos(user_id = "141696738@N08") getPhotoSearch(tags = c("cats", "dogs")) # Search for photos of cats and dogs in North Carolina nc_bbox <- c(-84.32385, 33.88199, -75.45698, 36.58965)  getPhotoSearch(tags = c("cats", "dogs"), bbox = nc_bbox) # Search for photos tagged "panda" in the area of Ueno Zoo, Tokyo, Japan getPhotoSearch(   tags = "panda",   bbox = c(139.7682226529, 35.712627977, 139.7724605432, 35.7181464141),   sort = "interestingness-desc",   extras = c("geo", "tags") )

title: Introduction to using FlickrAPI
text: two functions getting data specific Flickr photo: getExif() getPhotoInfo()

what: Get Flickr data for a photo
title: Introduction to using FlickrAPI
code: getPhotoInfo(photo_id = "51899696261", output = "url")

what: Get EXIF metadata for a photo
title: Introduction to using FlickrAPI
code: getExif(photo_id = "51872765082")

title: Authors and Citation
text: Koki Ando. Author, maintainer. Eli Pousson. Author, contributor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ando K, Pousson E (2023). FlickrAPI: Access Flickr API. R package version 0.1.0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {FlickrAPI: Access to Flickr API},   author = {Koki Ando and Eli Pousson},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0.1}, }

what: An R package for accessing the Flickr API.
title: An R package for accessing the Flickr API.
text: goal FlickrAPI provide interface Flickr API allow R users download data public photos uploaded Flickr.

title: An R package for accessing the Flickr API.
text: installing, set Flickr API key save local environment variable using setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE", install = TRUE). Flickr API available non-commercial use outside developers available commercial use prior arrangements. Review Flickr API documentation, API Overview, Flickr Developer Guide information.
code: install.packages("FlickrAPI") # remotes::install_github("koki25ando/FlickrAPI")

title: An R package for accessing the Flickr API.
text: can get photos individual user using getPhotos() function. information individual image, can use getPhotoInfo() getExif() function. can also search photos tag license.
code: library(FlickrAPI)  photos <- getPhotos(user_id = "grand_canyon_nps") knitr::kable(photos[1,]) photo_info <- getPhotoInfo(photo_id = photos$id[1], output = "tags") knitr::kable(photo_info[c(1:2),]) photo_exif <- getExif(photo_id = photos$id[10]) knitr::kable(photo_exif[1,]) photo_search <- getPhotoSearch(   sort = "date-taken-desc",   tags = c("cats", "dogs"),   per_page = 50)  knitr::kable(photo_search[1,])

title: An R package for accessing the Flickr API.
text: FlickrAPI CRAN (PDF) Flickr API

what: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickAPIRequest
title: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickAPIRequest
text: Request data Flickr API using provided method, API key, additional values passed `httr2::req_url_query`.

title: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickAPIRequest
code: FlickAPIRequest(method = NULL, api_key = NULL, ...)

title: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickAPIRequest
text: method Flickr API method use request. api_key Flickr API key. api_key `NULL`, function uses [getFlickrAPIKey()] use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. ... Additional parameters passed `httr2::req_url_query`

what: FlickrAPI: Access to Flickr API via R — FlickrAPI-package
title: FlickrAPI: Access to Flickr API via R — FlickrAPI-package
text: R package provides interface Flickr API https://www.flickr.com/services/api/, allows R users download publicly available data Flickr feed location, EXIF, list photos posted specific user.

title: FlickrAPI: Access to Flickr API via R — FlickrAPI-package
text: Koki Ando koki.25.ando@gmail.com

what: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickrAPIRequest
title: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickrAPIRequest
text: Request data Flickr API using provided method, API key, additional values passed httr2::req_url_query().

title: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickrAPIRequest
code: FlickrAPIRequest(   method = NULL,   api_key = NULL,   format = "json",   simplifyVector = TRUE,   check_type = FALSE,   ... )

title: Request data from the Flickr API — FlickrAPIRequest
text: method Flickr API method use request. api_key Flickr API key. api_key NULL, function uses getFlickrAPIKey() use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. format Format parameter passed httr2::req_url_query() simplifyVector Default TRUE, passed httr2::resp_body_json() check_type Default FALSE, passed httr2::resp_body_json() ... Additional parameters passed httr2::req_url_query()

what: Get EXIF data for a Flickr photo. — getExif
title: Get EXIF data for a Flickr photo. — getExif
text: Return data EXIF data given photo. calling user must permission view photo.

title: Get EXIF data for a Flickr photo. — getExif
code: getExif(api_key = NULL, photo_id = NULL, secret = NULL)  get_exif(api_key = NULL, photo_id = NULL, secret = NULL)

title: Get EXIF data for a Flickr photo. — getExif
text: api_key Flickr API key. api_key NULL, function uses getFlickrAPIKey() use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. photo_id id photo fetch EXIF information . secret secret photo. correct secret passed permissions checking skipped. enables 'sharing' individual photos passing around id secret.

title: Get EXIF data for a Flickr photo. — getExif
text: data.frame EXIF information image provided photo_id.

title: Get EXIF data for a Flickr photo. — getExif
code: if (FALSE) { getExif(   api_key = get_flickr_api_key(),   photo_id = "45961963324" ) }

what: Get a data frame of hot tags for a given time period. — getHotTags
title: Get a data frame of hot tags for a given time period. — getHotTags
text: Get data frame hot tags given time period.

title: Get a data frame of hot tags for a given time period. — getHotTags
code: getHotTags(api_key = NULL, period = c("day", "week"), count = 20)  get_hot_tags(api_key = NULL, period = c("day", "week"), count = 20)

title: Get a data frame of hot tags for a given time period. — getHotTags
text: api_key Flickr API key. api_key NULL, function uses getFlickrAPIKey() use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. period period fetch hot tags. Valid values day week. Defaults day count number tags return. Defaults 20. Maximum allowed value 200.

title: Get a data frame of hot tags for a given time period. — getHotTags
text: function data frame hot tags given period

title: Get a data frame of hot tags for a given time period. — getHotTags
code: if (FALSE) { getHotTags(   api_key = get_flickr_api_key(),   period = "day",   count = 20 ) }

what: Get available information for a Flickr photo. — getPhotoInfo
title: Get available information for a Flickr photo. — getPhotoInfo
text: R access photo information photos posted Flickr via Flickr API.

title: Get available information for a Flickr photo. — getPhotoInfo
code: getPhotoInfo(   api_key = NULL,   photo_id,   output = c("location", "date", "url", "tags") )  get_photo_info(   api_key = NULL,   photo_id,   output = c("location", "date", "url", "tags") )

title: Get available information for a Flickr photo. — getPhotoInfo
text: api_key Flickr API key. api_key NULL, function uses getFlickrAPIKey() use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. photo_id id photo get information . output Output data type. Supported options include "", "location", "date", "url" "tags". output = "", function returns list available data. Otherwise function returns data frame.

title: Get available information for a Flickr photo. — getPhotoInfo
text: function returns data specific photo's information.

title: Get available information for a Flickr photo. — getPhotoInfo
code: if (FALSE) { getPhotoInfo(   api_key = get_flickr_api_key(),   photo_id = "30484882493",   output = "location" ) }

what: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
title: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
text: Use Flickr Search API return pages photos sorted date posted, date taken, interestingness, relevance. Optional search parameters including spatial bounding box, user id, tags, image license.

title: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
code: getPhotoSearch(   api_key = NULL,   user_id = NULL,   tags = NULL,   license_id = NULL,   sort = "date-posted",   desc = FALSE,   bbox = NULL,   img_size = NULL,   date = NULL,   upload_date = NULL,   extras = NULL,   per_page = 100,   page = NULL,   ... )  get_photo_search(   api_key = NULL,   user_id = NULL,   tags = NULL,   license_id = NULL,   sort = "date-posted",   desc = FALSE,   bbox = NULL,   img_size = NULL,   date = NULL,   upload_date = NULL,   extras = NULL,   per_page = 100,   page = NULL,   ... )

title: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
text: api_key Flickr API key. api_key NULL, function uses getFlickrAPIKey() use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. user_id NSID user photos search. parameter NULL passed public photos searched. tags vector tags search . license_id license id photos. possible values, see Flickr API method flickr.photos.licenses.getInfo see details information. license_id provided, "license" added extras. sort Order sort returned photos. possible values : "date-posted-asc", "date-posted-desc", "date-taken-asc", "date-taken-desc", "interestingness-desc", "interestingness-asc", "relevance" trailing "-asc" "-desc" indicator sort direction optional using desc parameter. desc TRUE, sort descending order selected sort variable; defaults FALSE. bbox object class bbox numeric vector values xmin, ymin, xmax ymax representing bottom-left corner box top-right corner. img_size character string abbreviation one image sizes ("sq", "t", "s", "q", "m", "n", "z", "c", "l", "o"). single img_size provided url, width, height columns renamed (e.g. img_url instead url_sq) img_asp column added results; defaults NULL. date Date taken format supported .POSIXlt(). date length 1 vector, treated minimum date taken maximum set one day later. date length greater 1, minimum maximum date vector used.  date provided, "date_taken" added extras. upload_date Date uploaded format supported .POSIXlt(). upload_date length 1 vector, treated minimum date uploaded maximum set one day later. date length greater 1, minimum maximum date vector used.  date provided, "date_upload" added extras. extras vector extra information fetch returned record. Currently supported fields : c("description", "license", "date_upload", "date_taken", "owner_name", "icon_server", "original_format", "last_update", "geo", "tags", "machine_tags", "o_dims", "views", "media", "path_alias", "url_sq", "url_t", "url_s", "url_q", "url_m", "url_n", "url_z", "url_c", "url_l", "url_o") per_page Number specifying many results per page return. Default 100 results per page. Maximum 250 bbox provided 500 otherwise. page Number specifying search results page return. Default page 1 results returned. ... Dots can used pass additional arguments supported flickr.photos.search API method excluding license, min_taken_date, max_taken_date, min_upload_date, max_upload_date supported named parameters. Dots also support two legacy parameters: licence_id (variant spelling license_id) geo (set geo = TRUE include "geo" extras).

title: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
text: function returns data specific photos matching search parameters.

title: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
text: License id options: license_id can integer 0 10 corresponding license code including: "c" (Rights Reserved), "-bc-sa" (Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike), "-nc" (Attribution-NonCommercial), "-nc-nd" (Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs), "" (Attribution), "-sa" (Attribution-ShareAlike), "-nd" (Attribution-NoDerivs), "nkc" (known copyright restrictions), "pd-us" (United States Government Work), "cc0" (Public Domain Dedication), "pd" (Public Domain Mark).

title: Search for photos on Flickr by user id, tags, license, or bounding box — getPhotoSearch
code: if (FALSE) { # Search for photos tagged "cats" and "dogs" # Return images in descending order of date taken getPhotoSearch(   api_key = get_flickr_api_key(),   sort = "date-taken-desc",   tags = c("cats", "dogs") ) } if (FALSE) { # Search for photos uploaded to the NPS Grand Canyon user account. # Return extra fields including the date taken and square image URL. getPhotoSearch(   api_key = get_flickr_api_key(),   user_id = "grand_canyon_nps",   extras = c("date_taken", "url_sq") ) } if (FALSE) { # Search for photos tagged "panda" in the area of Ueno Zoo, Tokyo, Japan getPhotoSearch(   api_key = get_flickr_api_key(),   tags = "panda",   bbox = c(139.7682226529, 35.712627977, 139.7724605432, 35.7181464141),   extras = c("geo", "owner_name", "tags") ) }

what: Get Flickr user photos or a user's favorite photos — getPhotos
title: Get Flickr user photos or a user's favorite photos — getPhotos
text: Returns photos given user's photo stream. photos visible calling user returned.

title: Get Flickr user photos or a user's favorite photos — getPhotos
code: getPhotos(user_id = NULL, img_size = "s", extras = NULL, api_key = NULL, ...)  get_photos(user_id = NULL, img_size = "s", extras = NULL, api_key = NULL, ...)  getFavePhotos(   user_id = NULL,   img_size = "s",   extras = NULL,   fave_date = NULL,   public = TRUE,   api_key = NULL,   page = NULL,   per_page = 100,   ... )  get_fave_photos(   user_id = NULL,   img_size = "s",   extras = NULL,   fave_date = NULL,   public = TRUE,   api_key = NULL,   page = NULL,   per_page = 100,   ... )

title: Get Flickr user photos or a user's favorite photos — getPhotos
text: user_id NSID user whose photos return. value "" return calling user's photos. img_size character string abbreviation one image sizes ("sq", "t", "s", "q", "m", "n", "z", "c", "l", "o"). single img_size provided url, width, height columns renamed (e.g. img_url instead url_sq) img_asp column added results; defaults NULL. extras vector extra information fetch returned record. Currently supported fields : c("description", "license", "date_upload", "date_taken", "owner_name", "icon_server", "original_format", "last_update", "geo", "tags", "machine_tags", "o_dims", "views", "media", "path_alias", "url_sq", "url_t", "url_s", "url_q", "url_m", "url_n", "url_z", "url_c", "url_l", "url_o") api_key Flickr API key. api_key NULL, function uses getFlickrAPIKey() use environment variable "FLICKR_API_KEY" key. ... Arguments passed getPhotoSearch tags vector tags search . license_id license id photos. possible values, see Flickr API method flickr.photos.licenses.getInfo see details information. license_id provided, "license" added extras. sort Order sort returned photos. possible values : "date-posted-asc", "date-posted-desc", "date-taken-asc", "date-taken-desc", "interestingness-desc", "interestingness-asc", "relevance" trailing "-asc" "-desc" indicator sort direction optional using desc parameter. desc TRUE, sort descending order selected sort variable; defaults FALSE. bbox object class bbox numeric vector values xmin, ymin, xmax ymax representing bottom-left corner box top-right corner. date Date taken format supported .POSIXlt(). date length 1 vector, treated minimum date taken maximum set one day later. date length greater 1, minimum maximum date vector used.  date provided, "date_taken" added extras. upload_date Date uploaded format supported .POSIXlt(). upload_date length 1 vector, treated minimum date uploaded maximum set one day later. date length greater 1, minimum maximum date vector used.  date provided, "date_upload" added extras. fave_date Date favorited format supported .POSIXlt(). fave_date length 1 vector, treated minimum date uploaded maximum set one day later. fave_date length greater 1, minimum maximum date vector used. date provided, "date_upload" added extras. public TRUE, get public favorites (authentication needed). FALSE, get favorites (requires authentication access). page Number specifying search results page return. Default page 1 results returned. per_page Number specifying many results per page return. Default 100 results per page. Maximum 250 bbox provided 500 otherwise.
